H0.text: The largest ice fields in the southern hemisphere outside Antarctica are located where. New Zealand

H1.text: The largest ice fields in the southern hemisphere outside Antarctica are located where. Tasmania

H2.text: The largest ice fields in the southern hemisphere outside Antarctica are located where. The Falkland Islands

H3.text: The largest ice fields in the southern hemisphere outside Antarctica are located where. Patagonia

A4.text: The Southern Patagonian Ice Field is the world's second largest contiguous extrapolar ice field.
